---
pagetitle: "Hypothesis Testing - Means Left Tail Z Test Question"
params:
  xbar: 48 
  n: 40 
  mu: 50 
  sigma: 5 
---

```{r}
mu<-params$mu
xbar<-params$xbar
n<-params$n 
sigma<-params$sigma
```

Suppose that we wish to test if a population mean is less than $`r mu`$. We take a sample of size $n=`r n`$ and get $\bar x=`r xbar`$. Suppose that the population standard deviation is $\sigma=`r sigma`$
